inclusion.criterion: Man or woman between 18-70 years TAO with CAS of ≥ 4 (less than 3 months)
inclusion.label: met
met
inclusion.evidence: CBC was at her baseline, w/normal differential

exclusion.criterion: Previous treatment with steroids for TAO
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: Pt is on steroid taper which is new for her

exclusion.criterion: Positive Hepatitis B or C serology.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Receipt of a live vaccine within 4 weeks prior RTX+MTX to randomization
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: Pt was stabilized on IV steroids and IV benadryl

exclusion.criterion: History of recurrent significant infection or history of recurrent bacterial infections
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patient who may not attend to the protocol according to the investigators opinion.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Pt is a 22yo F otherwise healthy with a 5 yr history of systemic mastocytosis, presenting with flushing and tachycardia concerning for another flare. She responded well to IV steroids and diphenydramine.
